verses.verse: And Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30>, the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, took <WH3947> each <WH376> of them his censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein <WH2004>, and laid <WH7760> incense <WH7004> thereon <WH7126>, and offered strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, which he had not commanded them <WH6680>.
And there came forth <WH3318> fire <WH784> from before Jehovah <WH3068>, and devoured <WH398> them <WH4191>, and they died before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.

Then Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, This is it that Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696>, saying <WH559>, I will be sanctified <WH6942> in them that come nigh <WH7138> me <WH6440>, and before all the people <WH5971> I will be glorified <WH3513>. And Aaron <WH175> held his peace <WH1826>.

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Mishael <WH4332> and Elzaphan <WH469>, the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816> the uncle <WH1730> of Aaron <WH175>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH7126>, Draw near, carry <WH5375> your brethren <WH251> from before <WH6440> the sanctuary <WH6944> out <WH2351> of the camp <WH4264>.
So they drew near <WH7126>, and carried <WH5375> them in their coats <WH3801> out <WH2351> of the camp <WH4264>, as Moses <WH4872> had said <WH1696>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, and unto Eleazar <WH499> and unto Ithamar <WH385>, his sons <WH1121>, Let not the hair of your heads <WH7218> go loose <WH6544>, neither rend <WH6533> your clothes <WH899>; that ye die <WH4191> not <WH7107>, and that he be not wroth with all the congregation <WH5712>: but let your brethren <WH251>, the whole house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, bewail <WH1058> the burning <WH8316> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath kindled <WH8313>.

And ye shall not go out <WH3318> from the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, lest ye die <WH4191>; for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> of Jehovah <WH3068> is upon you <WH6213>. And they did according to the word <WH1697> of Moses <WH4872>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,

Drink <WH8354> no wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH8354>, thou <WH1121>, nor thy sons with thee <WH935>, when ye go into the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, that ye die <WH4191> not <WH2708>: it shall be a statute for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755>:
and that ye may make a distinction <WH914> between the holy <WH6944> and the common <WH2455>, and between the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889>;
and that ye may teach <WH3384> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> all the statutes <WH2706> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> unto them by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872>.

And Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, and unto Eleazar <WH499> and unto Ithamar <WH385>, his sons <WH1121> that were left <WH3498>, Take <WH3947> the meal-offering <WH4503> that remaineth <WH3498> of the offerings <WH4503> of Jehovah <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, and eat <WH398> it without leaven <WH4682> beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196>; for it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>;

and ye shall eat <WH398> it in a holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>, because it is thy portion <WH2706>, and thy sons <WH1121>' portion <WH2706>, of the offerings <WH801> of Jehovah <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>: for so I am commanded <WH6680>.

And the <WH8573> wave-breast <WH2373> and the <WH8641> heave-thigh <WH7785> shall ye eat <WH398> in a clean <WH2889> place <WH4725>, thou <WH1121>, and thy sons, and thy daughters <WH1323> with thee <WH2706>: for they are given as thy portion, and thy sons <WH1121>' portion <WH2706>, out <WH5414> of the sacrifices <WH2077> of the peace-offerings <WH8002> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

The <WH8641> heave-thigh <WH7785> and the <WH8573> wave-breast <WH2373> shall they bring <WH935> with the offerings made by fire <WH801> of the fat <WH2459>, to wave <WH5130> it for a wave-offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: and it shall be thine <WH1121>, and thy sons' with thee <WH2706>, as a portion for ever <WH5769>; as Jehovah <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680>.

And Moses <WH4872> diligently <WH1875> sought <WH1875> the goat <WH8163> of the sin-offering <WH2403>, and <WH8313>, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry <WH7107> with Eleazar <WH499> and with Ithamar <WH385>, the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> that were left <WH3498>, saying <WH559>,

Wherefore have ye not eaten <WH398> the sin-offering <WH2403> in the place <WH4725> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, seeing it is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>, and he hath given <WH5414> it you to bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the congregation <WH5712>, to make atonement <WH3722> for them before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>?

Behold <WH2005>, the blood <WH1818> of it was not brought <WH935> into the sanctuary <WH6944> within <WH6441>: ye should certainly <WH398> have eaten <WH398> it in the sanctuary <WH6944>, as I commanded <WH6680>.

And Aaron <WH175> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, Behold <WH3117>, this day have they offered <WH7126> their sin-offering <WH2403> and their burnt-offering <WH2403> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>; and there have befallen <WH7122> me such things as these <WH398>: and if I had eaten the sin-offering <WH2403> to-day <WH3117>, would it have been well-pleasing <WH3190> in the sight <WH5869> of Jehovah <WH3068>?
And when Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> that <WH3190>, it was well-pleasing in his sight.
